title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday 6 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: northampton town striker ivan toney signs for newcastle united .
wellingborough council rejects plans for 210 homes in irchester .
northamptonshire 's cricketers beat kent by an innings .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: good evening
text: that 's all from local live today .
there has been plenty of sports news today , with cobblers ' 19-year-old striker ivan toney
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 .
see you then .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: weather : dry evening , cooler night
text: a fine evening with sunny spells to end the day .
staying mainly dry overnight with skies clearing , and a few mist patches forming later .
friday will be a largely fine , dry day with sunny spells , but cloud amounts increasing through the day .
feeling pleasantly warm with light and variable winds , temperatures reaching up to 22c ( 72f ) .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: 'twenty million steps ' aims to tackle obesity
text: figures from northamptonshire county council show that 67.5 % of adults in northamptonshire are classed as overweight or obese .
to tackle this , the council is challenging people to collectively walk a total of 20 million steps in one weekend .
the 20 million steps weekend will take place from september 18-20 and
during last year 's inaugural event , residents across the county clocked up 24,177,082 steps , with 7,000 people taking part .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: newcastle signing ivan toney 'has n't fulfilled hype '
text: even though he 's signed for a premier league club , i personally still feel ivan toney needs games consistently at league two level .
the 19-year-old striker has joined newcastle united for an undisclosed fee .
i do n't think , personally speaking , he 's fulfilled the hype that 's been put around him .
author: Terry Angus
Cobblers summariser, BBC Radio Northampton

the manager , who did not want to be named , said that one player had gone into the pub and apologised for the way the group behaved last saturday night .
she said that the mainly female team of staff who were working that night were intimidated , but said the pub were keen to put the incident behind them - and were hoping for a trouble-free weekend .

BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: steve mclaren : toney is a 'good signing ' for newcastle
text: i 've been speaking to newcastle united boss steve mclaren about the signing of 19-year-old ivan toney from northampton town .
the striker has moved to the premier league club for an undisclosed fee .
former england manger mcclaren said : `` he joined in the first team yesterday , held his own very well .
for the development squad he 's a good signing . ''
author: Mick Lowes
BBC Newcastle football commentator

i have spoken to northamptonshire police , which said it had `` nothing to do with this '' and `` knew nothing about it '' .

BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire win by an innings
text: northamptonshire have wrapped up an excellent victory over kent at canterbury , winning by an innings and 23 runs .
kent offered some resistance through robert key ( 42 ) and sam billings ( 43 ) , but with an outstanding second innings display with the ball , the county secured the win within three days .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: newcastle sign ivan toney : 'he has huge ability '
text: premier league newcastle united have signed 19-year-old northampton town striker ivan toney .

cobblers boss chris wilder says he 's not surprised by the move : `` it 's clear he has a huge amount of ability and to have played 60 games and scored 13 goals in senior football at 19-years-old shows just how much potential he has .
`` he is already used to senior football and he has the outlook and physical presence way beyond many other 19-year-olds . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: villages could be 'swallowed up ' by towns
text: the county landowners association ( cla ) claims villages in northamptonshire are dying because local councils are not applying government planning guidelines properly .
claire wright , from
`` we do n't want these villages [ like flore ] swallowed up by local towns . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: newcastle 'already impressed ' with toney
text: peter beardsley , football development manager at newcastle united , said the premier league club have already been `` very impressed '' by ivan toney .
the 19-year-old striker has completed his move from northampton town , for an undisclosed fee .
former england attacker beardsley said : `` he is a very good player , with great enthusiasm and a first-class attitude , and has all the attributes to have a bright future at the club . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: weather : bright afternoon and warm
text: it will be a much brighter afternoon compared to the morning , with all parts seeing some sunny spells .
with a light breeze , it will feel pleasantly warm in the sunshine and a top temperature of 22c ( 72f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
Presenter, BBC Weather

documents.title: defendant in court for 'damaging a mug and a mirror '
text: i 'm at northampton magistrates ' court today and we 're on to the case of a man who is in for damaging a mug and a mirror belonging to his father .
he has pleaded guilty to damage .
prosecution says it was a fall out with his father and he 's been ticketed for being drunk and disorderly in the past .
his father told police he could n't deal with it any more and hopes by allowing the case to go to court his son will get the help he needs .
the defendant then shouted from court he has nowhere else to go .
he was given a conditional discharge and fined £ 250 .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: sekhemka statue 's whereabouts still unclear
text: i have once again spoken to the department of culture , media and sport about the export bar on the 4,000-year-old egyptian statue sekhemka , which expired last week , and it again told me `` an announcement will be made in due course '' .
the statue was sold for £ 15.76m by
we still have no clue as to where the statue is .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: newcastle signing ivan toney : 'i want to progress '
text: newcastle united have signed 19-year-old striker ivan toney from northampton town , for an undisclosed fee , on what the premier league club describe as a `` long-term deal '' .
the player , who last season made 44 appearances in all competitions , scoring 10 goals , said : `` being a young lad who is scoring goals in the football league was a great thing .
`` now i want to progress here and eventually do it in the premier league . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: drama at northampton magistrates ' court
text: i 'm in northampton magistrates ' court and will bring you updates of those who are dealt with today , but things have n't got off to the best start .
there 's drama here as a defendant screamed across to his girlfriend to stay with him while he 's inside , having full conversations from the dock as magistrates sit there .
it 's taken some time for things to calm down .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: opening up of abington street 'lawful '
text: an external auditor has said that northampton borough council 's decision to open up abington street was `` lawful '' , but that `` some aspects of the consultation process were not as well managed as they could of been '' .

also , the auditor , which was responding to a complaint from a local resident about how the council proceeded in the opening up of abington street , said : `` the borough council 's view that trade and footfall would increase as a result of the de-pedestrianisation is not backed up by evidence . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: newcastle sign ivan toney : other big cobblers movers
text: with ivan toney signing for newcastle united , i 've been looking back at some former cobblers players who 've left sixfields .
along with toney , potentially , playing in the premier league will be keeper mark bunn , who 's
the last 'homegrown ' player like toney , who was born in northampton , was michael jacobs ( from rothwell .
he left the cobblers for derby in 2012 , subsequently moved to wolves and
but the most famous ex-cobblers player is phil neal , who went on to glory for liverpool and england , but recently returned to irchester to
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: newcastle sign ivan toney : 'fans would have wanted more '
text: ivan toney is the most exciting prospect to have emerged at northampton since mark bunn ( now at aston villa ) and bradley johnson ( norwich city ) , and he could quite possibly make a bigger mark on the higher echelons of the game - having signed for premier league side newcastle united .
but cobblers fans would have been hoping for another year or two from toney , 19 , to get them at least one promotion before the club cashed in .
speaking to ivan over the last season , he made no secret of his ambition to be playing in the championship - at least .
author: Tim Oglethorpe
BBC Radio Northampton commentator

documents.title: newcastle sign ivan toney : factfile
text: newcastle united have signed northampton town striker ivan toney for an undisclosed fee .
here are three facts about the 19-year-old :

documents.title: newcastle signing ivan toney : 'happy to be here '
text: ivan toney has said that he is `` happy to be here and very excited , '' after signing for newcastle united from northampton town .
the 19-year-old said : `` the players here are a great standard and i ca n't wait to get going and show what i 'm all about . ''
the striker has signed for an undisclosed fee .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: ivan toney a 'credit to northampton town '
text: chris wilder has said that having a `` huge club '' like newcastle united sign ivan toney `` is of huge credit to ivan and northampton town '' .
the 19-year-old striker has completed his move to the premier league club , for an undisclosed fee , having passed a medical .
cobblers boss wilder said : `` we are really sorry to see him go but we understand and accept it is hard to stand in the way of a player when a big premier league club have an interest .
we wish ivan well . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: newcastle united sign northampton town striker ivan toney
text: northampton town striker ivan toney has passed his medical and completed his move to newcastle united .
toney , 19 , had been
cobblers boss chris wilder said : `` this is a fantastic opportunity for ivan to go and join one of the biggest clubs in the country . ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: irchester councillor : 'worst planning application i have ever seen '
text: the ward councillor for irchester on the borough council of wellingborough says a plan to build 150 homes in the village was `` the worst planning application i have ever seen '' .
tim maguire said the village had become a `` dumping ground '' and it had already taken its fair share of houses .
the council also rejected another plan for 60 homes in irchester .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: wellingborough council leader : 'we do not take threats '
text: the leader of wellingborough council says the authority does `` not take threats '' , saying it will stand up to any appeals following last night 's rejection of plans for 200 homes in irchester .
paul bell said that with plans in wellingborough to develop 7,200 homes , he does n't understand why developers keep coming back and asking to develop in the villages , ignoring the local plan .
he says the council `` has the funds to fight '' any appeal .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: plans for irchester homes turned down
text: plans to build more than 200 homes in irchester were thrown out by wellingborough council last night .
developers submitted two plans , to build 150 and 60 homes , but the council refused , saying the village was already on track to build the 150 homes it needs over the next 20 years .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: morning
text: welcome to local live for northamptonshire .
from now until 18:00 i 'll be bringing you the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the county from the bbc newsroom in northampton .

author: Pete Cooper
